dashboard.no-libraries: There are no libraries setup yet. Configure some in
dashboard.not-granted: You haven't been granted access to any libraries.

user-scrobble-history.title: Scrobble History
user-scrobble-history.description: Here you will find any scrobble events linked with your account. In order for events to exist, you must have an active scrobble provider configured. All events that have been processed will clear after a month. If there are non-processed events, it is likely these cannot form matches upstream. Please reach out to your admin to get them corrected.

review-series-modal.title: Edit Review
review-series-modal.min-length: Review must be at least {{count}} characters

want-to-read.title: Want To Read
want-to-read.no-items: There are no items. Try adding a series.
want-to-read.no-items-filtered: No items match your current filter.

user-preferences.title: User Dashboard
user-preferences.pref-description: These are global settings that are bound to your account.
user-preferences.page-layout-mode-tooltip: Show items as cards or list view on Series Detail page.
user-preferences.blur-unread-summaries-tooltip: Blurs summary text on volumes or chapters that have no read progress (to avoid spoilers)
user-preferences.prompt-on-download-tooltip: Prompt when a download exceeds {{size}}MB in size
user-preferences.disable-animations-tooltip: Turns off animations in the site. Useful for e-ink readers.
user-preferences.collapse-series-relationships-tooltip: Should Kavita show Series that have no relationships or is the parent/prequel
user-preferences.share-series-reviews-tooltip: Should Kavita include your reviews of Series for other users
user-preferences.reading-direction-tooltip: Direction to click to move to next page. Right to Left means you click on left side of screen to move to next page.
user-preferences.scaling-option-tooltip: How to scale the image to your screen.
user-preferences.page-splitting-tooltip: How to split a full width image (ie both left and right images are combined)
user-preferences.layout-mode-tooltip: Render a single image to the screen or two side-by-side images
user-preferences.tap-to-paginate-tooltip: Should the sides of the book reader screen allow tapping on it to move to prev/next page
user-preferences.immersive-mode-tooltip: This will hide the menu behind a click on the reader document and turn tap to paginate on
user-preferences.reading-direction-book-tooltip: Direction to click to move to next page. Right to Left means you click on left side of screen to move to next page.
user-preferences.font-family-tooltip: Font family to load up. Default will load the book's default font
user-preferences.writing-style-tooltip: Changes the direction of the text. Horizontal is left to right, vertical is top to bottom.
user-preferences.layout-mode-book-tooltip: How content should be laid out. Scroll is as the book packs it. 1 or 2 Column fits to the height of the device and fits 1 or 2 columns of text per page
user-preferences.color-theme-book-tooltip: What color theme to apply to the book reader content and menu
user-preferences.line-height-book-tooltip: How much spacing between the lines of the book
user-preferences.margin-book-tooltip: How much spacing on each side of the screen. This will override to 0 on mobile devices regardless of this setting.
user-preferences.clients-opds-alert: OPDS is not enabled on this server. This will not affect Tachiyomi users.
user-preferences.clients-opds-description: All 3rd Party clients will either use the API key or the Connection Url below. These are like passwords, keep it private.
user-preferences.clients-api-key-tooltip: The API key is like a password. Keep it secret, Keep it safe.

user-holds.title: Scrobble Holds
user-holds.description: This is a user-managed list of Series that will not be scrobbled to upstream providers. You can remove a series at any time and the next scrobble-able event (reading progress, rating, want to read status) will trigger events.

theme-manager.title: Theme Manager
theme-manager.looking-for-theme: Looking for a light or e-ink theme? We have some custom themes you can use on our
theme-manager.updated-toastr: Site default has been updated to {{name}}
theme-manager.scan-queued: A site theme scan has been queued

restriction-selector.title: Age Rating Restriction
restriction-selector.description: When selected, all series and reading lists that have at least one item that is greater than the selected restriction will be pruned from results.
restriction-selector.not-applicable-for-admins: This is not applicable for admins.
restriction-selector.include-unknowns-tooltip: If true, Unknowns will be allowed with Age Restriction. This could lead to untagged media leaking to users with Age restrictions.

manage-devices.title: Device Manager
manage-devices.description: This section is for you to setup devices that cannot connect to Kavita via a web browser and instead have an email address that accepts files.
manage-devices.no-devices: There are no devices setup yet
manage-devices.email-setup-alert: Want to send files to your devices? Have the your admin setup Email settings first!

edit-device.email-tooltip: This email will be used to accept the file via Send To

change-password.permission-error: You do not have permission to change your password. Reach out to the admin of the server.

change-email.email-updated-description: You can use the following link below to confirm the email for your account. If your server is externally accessible, an email will have been sent to the email and the link can be used to confirm the email.
change-email.invite-url-tooltip: Copy this and paste in a new tab
change-email.has-invalid-email: It looks like you do not have a valid email set. Change email will require the admin to send you a link to complete this action.
change-email.permission-error: You do not have permission to change your email. Reach out to the admin of the server.

api-key.regen-warning: Regenerating your API key will invalidate any existing clients.
api-key.confirm-reset: This will invalidate any OPDS configurations you have setup. Are you sure you want to continue?

scrobbling-providers.title: Scrobbling Providers
scrobbling-providers.requires: This feature requires an active {{product}} license
scrobbling-providers.instructions: First time users should click on "{{scrobbling-providers.generate}}" below to allow Kavita+ to talk with {{service}}. Once you authorize the program, copy and paste the token in the input below. You can regenerate your token at any time.

typeahead.add-custom-item: , type to add a custom item

directory-picker.title: Choose a Directory
directory-picker.instructions: Select a folder to view breadcrumb. Don't see your directory? Try checking / first.

library-access-modal.title: Library Access
library-access-modal.no-data: There are no libraries setup yet.

cbl-conflict-reason-pipe.all-series-missing: Your account is missing access to all series in the list or Kavita does not have anything present in the list.
cbl-conflict-reason-pipe.chapter-missing: {{series}}: Chapter {{chapter}} is missing from Kavita. This item will be skipped.
cbl-conflict-reason-pipe.empty-file: The cbl file is empty, nothing to be done.
cbl-conflict-reason-pipe.name-conflict: A reading list ({{readingListName}}) already exists on your account that matches the cbl file.
cbl-conflict-reason-pipe.series-collision: The series, {{seriesLink}}, collides with another series of the same name in another library.
cbl-conflict-reason-pipe.series-missing: The series, {{series}}, is missing from Kavita or your account does not have permission. All items with this series will be skipped from import.
cbl-conflict-reason-pipe.volume-missing: {{series}}: Volume {{volume}} is missing from Kavita or your account does not have permission. All items with this volume number will be skipped.
cbl-conflict-reason-pipe.all-chapter-missing: All chapters cannot be matched to Chapters in Kavita.
cbl-conflict-reason-pipe.invalid-file: The file is corrupted or not matching the expected tags/spec.

reset-password.title: Password Reset
reset-password.description: Enter the email of your account. Kavita will send you an email if a valid one on file, otherwise ask the admin for the link from logs.

changelog.description: If you do not see an {{installed}}
changelog.description-continued: tag, you are on a nightly release. Only major versions will show as available.

invite-user.title: Invite User
invite-user.description:
Invite a user to your server by entering their email. They'll receive an email to create an account. For this to work you must have the Host Name and Email setting fields set in the Email tab, otherwise a link will be presented to you to setup on the user's behalf.

The email is not required to be valid.
invite-user.setup-user-description: You can use the following link below to setup the account for your user or use the copy button. You may need to log out before using the link to register a new user. If Kavita can determine your server as accessibile externally (or Host Name is set), an email will have been sent to the user and the links can be used by them to finish setting up their account. Otherwise, use the link below or in logs to manually send to them or setup their account.
invite-user.setup-user-account-tooltip: Copy this and paste in a new tab. You may need to log out.

library-selector.title: Libraries
library-selector.no-data: There are no libraries setup yet.

license.title: Kavita+ License
license.invalid-license-tooltip: If your subscription has ended, you must email support to get a new subscription created
license.activate-description: Enter the License Key and Email used to register with Stripe
license.activate-discordId-tooltip: Link your Discord Account with Kavita+. This grants you access to hidden channels to help shape Kavita.
license.discord-validation: This is not a valid Discord User Id. Your user id is not your discord username.
license.activate-reset-tooltip: Untie your license with this server. Requires both License and Email.

book-reader.title: Book Settings
book-reader.incognito-mode-alt: Incognito mode is on. Toggle to turn off.
book-reader.go-to-page-prompt: There are {{totalPages}} pages. What page do you want to go to?

confirm-email.title: Register
confirm-email.description: Complete the form to complete your registration

confirm-email-change.title: Validate Email Change
confirm-email-change.non-confirm-description: Please wait while your email update is validated.
confirm-email-change.confirm-description: Your email has been validated and is now changed within Kavita. You will be redirected to login.

register.title: Register
register.description: Complete the form to register an admin account
register.email-tooltip: Email does not need to be a real address, but provides access to forgot password. It is not sent outside the server unless forgot password is used without a custom email service host.

series-detail.no-chapters: There are no chapters to this volume. Cannot read.
series-detail.cover-change: It can take up to a minute for your browser to refresh the image. Until then, the old image may be shown on some pages.

side-nav.donate-tooltip: You can remove this by subscribing to Kavita+

library-settings-modal.type-tooltip: Library type determines how filenames are parsed and if the UI shows Chapters (Manga) vs Issues (Comics). Book work the same way as Manga but have different naming in the UI.
library-settings-modal.help-us-part-3: to naming and organizing your media.
library-settings-modal.naming-conventions-part-3: Check this link to ensure you are following, else files my not show up in scan.
library-settings-modal.cover-description: Custom library image icons are optional
library-settings-modal.cover-description-extra: Library image should not be large. Aim for a small file, 32x32 pixels in size. Kavita does not perform validation on size.
library-settings-modal.manage-collection-tooltip: Should Kavita create Collections from SeriesGroup tags found within ComicInfo.xml/opf files
library-settings-modal.manage-reading-list-tooltip: Should Kavita create Reading Lists from StoryArc/StoryArcNumber and AlternativeSeries/AlternativeCount tags found within ComicInfo.xml/opf files
library-settings-modal.allow-scrobbling-tooltip: Should Kavita scrobble reading events, want to read status, ratings, and reviews to configured providers. This will only occur if the server has an active Kavita+ Subscription.
library-settings-modal.folder-watching-tooltip: Override Server folder watching for this library. If off, folder watching won't run on the folders this library contains. If libraries share folders, then folders may still be ran against. Will always wait 10 minutes before triggering scan.
library-settings-modal.include-in-dashboard-tooltip: Should series from the library be included on the Dashboard. This affects all streams, like On Deck, Recently Updated, Recently Added, or any custom additions.
library-settings-modal.include-in-recommendation-tooltip: Should series from the library be included on the Recommended page.
library-settings-modal.include-in-search-tooltip: Should series and any derived information (genres, people, files) from the library be included in search results.
library-settings-modal.force-scan-tooltip: This will force a scan on the library, treating like a fresh scan
library-settings-modal.file-type-group-tooltip: What types of files should Kavita scan for. For example, Archive will include all cb*, zip, rar, etc files.
library-settings-modal.exclude-patterns-tooltip: Configure a set of patterns (Glob syntax) that Kavita will match when scanning directories and exclude from Scanner results.

reader-settings.writing-style-tooltip: Changes the direction of the text. Horizontal is left to right, vertical is top to bottom.
reader-settings.tap-to-paginate-tooltip: Click the edges of the screen to paginate
reader-settings.immersive-mode-tooltip: This will hide the menu behind a click on the reader document and turn tap to paginate on
reader-settings.layout-mode-tooltip:
Scroll: Mirrors epub file (usually one long scrolling page per chapter).
1 Column: Creates a single virtual page at a time.
2 Column: Creates two virtual pages at a time laid out side-by-side.

table-of-contents.no-data: This book does not have Table of Contents set in the metadata or a toc file

bookmarks.title: {{side-nav.bookmarks}}
bookmarks.no-data: There are no bookmarks. Try creating
bookmarks.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to clear all bookmarks for multiple series? This cannot be undone.
bookmarks.confirm-single-delete: Are you sure you want to clear all bookmarks for {{seriesName}}? This cannot be undone.

edit-series-relation.description-part-1: Not sure what relationship to add? See our

manage-alerts.description-part-1: This table contains issues found during scan or reading of your media. This list is non-managed. You can clear it at any time and use Library (Force) Scan to perform analysis. A list of some common errors and what they mean can be found on the

manage-email-settings.title: Email Services (SMTP)
manage-email-settings.description: In order to use some functions of Kavita like Forgot Password and Send To Device, an email provider must be setup. Other features like Password change are less secure without Email setup.
manage-email-settings.send-to-warning: If you want Send to Device to work you must setup your email settings
manage-email-settings.email-url-tooltip: Use fully qualified URL of the email service. Do not include ending slash.
manage-email-settings.host-name-tooltip: Domain Name (of Reverse Proxy). If set, email generation will always use this.
manage-email-settings.host-name-validation: Host name must start with http(s) and not end in /
manage-email-settings.sender-address-tooltip: This is the email address from which the receiver will see when they receive the email. Typically the email address associated with the account.
manage-email-settings.sender-displayname-tooltip: The name from which the receiver will see when they receive the email
manage-email-settings.host-tooltip: Outgoing/SMTP address of your email server
manage-email-settings.username-tooltip: The username used to authenticate against the host
manage-email-settings.size-limit-tooltip: How many bytes can the Email Server handle for attachments
manage-email-settings.customized-templates-tooltip: Should Kavita use config/templates directory for templates rather than default? You are responsible to keep up to date with template changes.

manage-library.title: Libraries
manage-library.no-data: There are no libraries. Try creating one.

manage-media-settings.encode-as-description-part-1: WebP/AVIF can drastically reduce space requirements for files. WebP/AVIF is not supported on all browsers or versions. To learn if these settings are appropriate for your setup, visit
manage-media-settings.encode-as-warning: You cannot convert back to PNG once you've gone to WebP/AVIF. You would need to refresh covers on your libraries to regenerate all covers. Bookmarks and favicons cannot be converted.
manage-media-settings.media-warning: You must trigger the media conversion task in Tasks Tab.,
manage-media-settings.encode-as-tooltip: All media Kavita manages (covers, bookmarks, favicons) will be encoded as this type.
manage-media-settings.bookmark-dir-tooltip: Location where bookmarks will be stored. Bookmarks are source files and can be large. Choose a location with adequate storage. Directory is managed; other files within directory will be deleted. If Docker, mount an additional volume and use that.
manage-media-settings.cover-image-size-tooltip: How large should cover images generate as. Note: Anything larger than the default will incur longer page load times.

manage-scrobble-errors.description: This table contains issues found during scrobbling. This list is non-managed. You can clear it at any time and wait for the next scrobble upload to see. If there is an unknown series, you are best correcting the series name or localized series name or adding a weblink for the providers.

manage-settings.restart-required: Changing Port, Base Url, Cache Size or IPs requires a manual restart of Kavita to take effect.
manage-settings.base-url-tooltip: Use this if you want to host Kavita on a base url ie) yourdomain.com/kavita. Not supported on Docker using non-root user.
manage-settings.ip-address-tooltip: Comma separated list of Ip addresses the server listens on. This is fixed if you are running on Docker. Requires restart to take effect.
manage-settings.port-tooltip: Port the server listens on. This is fixed if you are running on Docker. Requires restart to take effect.
manage-settings.backup-tooltip: The number of backups to maintain. Default is 30, minimum is 1, maximum is 30.
manage-settings.log-tooltip: The number of logs to maintain. Default is 30, minimum is 1, maximum is 30.
manage-settings.logging-level-tooltip: Use debug to help identify issues. Debug can eat up a lot of disk space.
manage-settings.cache-size-tooltip: The amount of memory allowed for caching heavy APIs. Default is 75MB.
manage-settings.on-deck-last-progress-tooltip: The number of days since last progress before kicking something off On Deck.
manage-settings.on-deck-last-chapter-add-tooltip: The number of days since last chapter was added to include something On Deck.
manage-settings.allow-stats-tooltip-part-1: Send anonymous usage data to Kavita's servers. This includes information on certain features used, number of files, OS version, Kavita install version, CPU, and memory. We will use this information to prioritize features, bug fixes, and performance tuning. Requires restart to take effect. See the
manage-settings.opds-tooltip: OPDS support will allow all users to use OPDS to read and download content from the server.
manage-settings.folder-watching-tooltip: Allows Kavita to monitor Library Folders to detect changes and invoke scanning on those changes. This allows content to be updated without manually invoking scans or waiting for nightly scans. Will always wait 10 minutes before triggering scan.
manage-settings.cache-size-validation: You must have at least 50 MB.
manage-settings.max-logs-validation: You cannot have more than {{num}} logs
manage-settings.min-logs-validation: You must have at least 1 log
manage-settings.max-backup-validation: You cannot have more than {{num}} backup
manage-settings.min-backup-validation: You must have at least 1 backup
manage-settings.ip-address-validation: IP addresses can only contain valid IPv4 or IPv6 addresses
manage-settings.base-url-validation: Base URL must start and end with /

manage-tasks-settings.title: Recurring Tasks
manage-tasks-settings.library-scan-tooltip: How often Kavita will scan and refresh metadata around library files.
manage-tasks-settings.library-database-backup-tooltip: How often Kavita will backup the database and other related files.
manage-tasks-settings.cleanup-tooltip: How often Kavita will run cleanup tasks. This can be heavy and should be performed at midnight in most cases
manage-tasks-settings.cron-notation: This is not valid Cron Notation
manage-tasks-settings.convert-media-task-desc: Runs a long-running task which will convert all kavita-managed media to the target encoding. This is slow (especially on ARM devices).
manage-tasks-settings.convert-media-success: Conversion of Media to Target Encoding has been queued
manage-tasks-settings.bust-cache-task-desc: Busts the Kavita+ Cache - should only be used when debugging bad matches.
manage-tasks-settings.bust-locale-task-desc: Busts the Locale Cache. This can fix issues with strings not showing correctly after an update
manage-tasks-settings.clear-reading-cache-task-desc: Clears cached files for reading. Useful when you've just updated a file that you were previously reading within the last 24 hours.
manage-tasks-settings.clean-up-want-to-read-task-desc: Removes any series that users have fully read that are within Want to Read and have a publication status of Completed. Runs every 24 hours.
manage-tasks-settings.clean-up-want-to-read-task-success: Want to Read has been cleaned up
manage-tasks-settings.backup-database-task-desc: Takes a backup of the database, bookmarks, themes, manually uploaded covers, and config files.
manage-tasks-settings.backup-database-task-success: A job to backup the database has been queued
manage-tasks-settings.download-logs-task-desc: Compiles all log files into a zip and downloads it.
manage-tasks-settings.analyze-files-task-desc: Runs a long-running task which will analyze files to generate extension and size. This should only be ran once for the v0.7 release. Not needed if you installed post v0.7.
manage-tasks-settings.check-for-updates-task-desc: See if there are any Stable releases ahead of your version.

manage-users.title: Active Users
manage-users.username-pattern: Username can only contain the following characters and whitespace: {{characters}}

edit-collection-tags.title: Edit {{collectionName}} Collection
edit-collection-tags.promote-tooltip: Promotion means that the tag can be seen server-wide, not just for admin users. All series that have this tag will still have user-access restrictions placed on them.

library-recommended.no-data: Nothing to show here. Add some metadata to your library, read something or rate something. This library may also have recommendations turned off.

admin-dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
admin-dashboard.kavita+-desc-part-1: Kavita+ is a premium subscription service which unlocks features for all users on this Kavita instance. Buy a subscription to unlock

collection-detail.no-data: There are no items. Try adding a series.
collection-detail.no-data-filtered: No items match your current filter.

draggable-ordered-list.instructions-alt: When you put a number in the reorder input, the item will be inserted at that location and all other items will have their order updated.

edit-reading-list-modal.title: Edit Reading List: {{name}}
edit-reading-list-modal.year-validation: Must be greater than 1000, 0 or blank
edit-reading-list-modal.month-validation: Must be between 1 and 12 or blank
edit-reading-list-modal.promote-tooltip: Promotion means that the tag can be seen server-wide, not just for admin users. All series that have this tag will still have user-access restrictions placed on them.

import-cbl-modal.title: CBL Import
import-cbl-modal.import-description: To get started, import a .cbl file. Kavita will perform multiple checks before importing. Some steps will block moving forward due to issues with the file.
import-cbl-modal.validate-description: All files have been validated to see if there are any operations to do on the list. Any lists have have failed will not move to the next step. Fix the CBL files and retry.
import-cbl-modal.validate-warning: There are issues with the CBL that will prevent an import. Correct these issues then try again.
import-cbl-modal.validate-no-issue-description: No issues found with CBL, press next.
import-cbl-modal.dry-run-description: This is a dry run and shows what will happen if you press Next and perform the import. All Failures will not be imported.

pdf-reader.loading-message: Loading……PDFs may take longer than expected

infinite-scroller.continuous-reading-prev-chapter-alt: Scroll up to move to previous chapter
infinite-scroller.continuous-reading-next-chapter-alt: Scroll up to move to next chapter

manga-reader.incognito-alt: Incognito mode is on. Toggle to turn off.
manga-reader.first-time-reading-manga: Tap the image at any time to open the menu. You can configure different settings or go to page by clicking progress bar. Tap sides of image move to next/prev page.
manga-reader.layout-mode-switched: Layout mode switched to Single due to insufficient space to render double layout

metadata-filter.series-name-tooltip: Series name will filter against Name, Sort Name, or Localized Name

metadata-filter-row.unit-average-rating: Average Rating (Kavita+) - only for cached series

edit-series-modal.title: {{seriesName}} Details
edit-series-modal.web-link-description: Here you can add many different links to external services.
edit-series-modal.cover-image-description: Upload and choose a new cover image. Press Save to upload and override the cover.
edit-series-modal.highest-count-tooltip: Highest Count found across all ComicInfo in the Series
edit-series-modal.max-issue-tooltip: Max Issue or Volume field from all ComicInfo in the series

file-breakdown-stats.format-tooltip: Not Classified means Kavita has not scanned some files. This occurs on old files existing prior to v0.7. You may need to run a forced scan via Library settings modal.

errors.collection-invalid-access: You don't have access to any libraries this tag belongs to or this collection is invalid
errors.unknown-crit: There was an unknown critical error
errors.download: There was an issue downloading this file or you do not have permissions
errors.rejected-cover-upload: The image could not be fetched due to server refusing request. Please download and upload from file instead.

customize-dashboard-streams.no-data: All Smart filters added to Dashboard or none created yet.

customize-sidenav-streams.no-data: All Smart filters added to Side Nav or none created yet.
customize-sidenav-streams.no-data-external-source: All External Sources added to Side Nav or none created yet.
customize-sidenav-streams.reorder-when-filter-present: You cannot reorder items via drag & drop while a filter is present. Use {{customize-sidenav-streams.order-numbers-label}}

manage-external-sources.description: Enhance your experience by adding external servers and conveniently include them in your Side Nav for quick access to both your server and your friend's server.

edit-external-source-item.not-unique: External source exists with this host. Ensure you don't have duplicates
edit-external-source-item.title: New External Source
edit-external-source-item.pattern: Host must be a valid http(s):// url

toasts.regen-cover: A job has been enqueued to regenerate the cover image
toasts.no-pages: There are no pages. Kavita was not able to read this archive.
toasts.download-in-progress: Download is already in progress. Please wait.
toasts.unauthorized-1: You are not authorized to view this page.
toasts.confirm-delete-user: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
toasts.click-email-link: Please click this link to confirm your email. You must confirm to be able to login.
toasts.no-series-collection-warning: Warning! No series are selected, saving will delete the Collection. Are you sure you want to continue?
toasts.confirm-delete-reading-list: Are you sure you want to delete the reading list? This cannot be undone.
toasts.multiple-added-to-reading-list: Chapters and Volumes added to reading list
toasts.select-files-warning: You need to select files to move forward
toasts.incognito-off: Incognito mode is off. Progress will now start being tracked.
toasts.email-service-unresponsive: Email Service Url did not respond.
toasts.series-removed-want-to-read: Series removed from Want to Read list
toasts.theme-missing: The active theme no longer exists. Please refresh the page.
toasts.email-not-sent-test: There was an exception when sending the email. Check logs for details. This indicates improper settings.
toasts.email-not-sent: Email on file is not a valid email and can not be sent. A link has been dumped in logs. The admin can provide this link to complete flow.
toasts.k+-license-saved: License Key saved, but it is not valid. Click check to revalidate the subscription. First time registration may take a min to propagate.
toasts.k+-error: There was an error when activating your license. Please try again.
toasts.k+-delete-key: This will only delete Kavita's license key and allow a buy link to show. This will not cancel your subscription! Use this only if directed by support!
toasts.k+-reset-key: This will untie your key from a server and allow you to re-register a Kavita instance.
toasts.k+-reset-key-success: Your license has been un-registered. Use Edit button to re-register your instance and re-activate Kavita+
toasts.book-settings-info: You can modify book settings, save those settings for all books, and view table of contents from the drawer.
toasts.forced-scan-queued: A forced scan has been started for {{name}}
toasts.library-created: Library created successfully. A scan has been started.
toasts.email-sent-to-no-existing: Existing email is not valid. A link has been dumped to logs. Ask admin for link to complete email change.
toasts.email-sent-to: An email has been sent to your old email address for confirmation.
toasts.confirm-regen-covers: Refresh covers will force all cover images to be recalculated. This is a heavy operation. Are you sure you don't want to perform a Scan instead?
toasts.alert-long-running: This is a long running process. Please give it the time to complete before invoking again.
toasts.confirm-delete-multiple-series: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} series? It will not modify files on disk.
toasts.confirm-delete-series: Are you sure you want to delete this series? It will not modify files on disk.
toasts.alert-bad-theme: There is invalid or unsafe css in the theme. Please reach out to your admin to have this corrected. Defaulting to dark theme.
toasts.confirm-library-delete: Are you sure you want to delete the {{name}} library? You cannot undo this action.
toasts.confirm-library-type-change: Changing library type will trigger a new scan with different parsing rules and may lead to series being re-created and hence you may loose progress and bookmarks. You should backup before you do this. Are you sure you want to continue?
toasts.confirm-download-size: The {{entityType}} is {{size}}. Are you sure you want to continue?
toasts.confirm-delete-smart-filter: Are you sure you want to delete this Smart Filter?
toasts.external-source-already-exists: An External Source already exists with the same Name/Host/API Key
toasts.anilist-token-expired: Your AniList token is expired. Scrobbling will no longer process until you re-generate it in User Settings > Account

validation.valid-email: This must be a valid email
validation.password-validation: Password must be between 6 and 32 characters in length
